content:
I got this in my email:

We are pleased to announce that the next International Category Theory Conference - CT2024 - will take place at the Universidade de Santiago de Compostela (Spain). The conference will commence with a welcome reception on Sunday, June 23rd and will conclude on Saturday, June 29th.

The members of the CT2024 Scientific Committee are:

Maria Manuel Clementino
James Gray
Steve Lack
Tom Leinster (as chair)
Matias Menni
Susan Niefield
Tim Van der Linden

For more information about the conference, please visit our website at https://www.usc.gal/regaca/ct2024/
Just to help more people see this:

Dear colleagues,

The International Category Theory Conference – CT2024 – will take place from June 23rd to June 29th at the Universidade de Santiago de Compostela (Spain).

Submission of abstracts is now open. Please note that the deadline for submitting an abstract is the 20th of March. Notification of acceptance will be no later than the 30th of April.

We have also added some accommodation options on the webpage, with special prices for students. Unfortunately, availability is limited, so they will be booked on a first-come, first-served basis.

For more information about the conference, please visit our website at https://www.usc.gal/regaca/ct2024/

If you need to contact the organisers, please email us at ct.2024@usc.gal

Kind regards,

The members of the Organising Committee

Xabier Garcia Martinez, Manuel Ladra, Diana Rodelo, Tim Van der Linden
Just realised that the programme is now available: https://www.usc.gal/regaca/ct2024/programme.html
